attributes.action: Try to get Tug of War Reinstated as sport again in the olympic games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Tug of WAR SHOULD BE REINSTATED IN THE OLYMPIC GAMES PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
